Package ca.phon.ui

Class JRangeSlider

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
ca.phon.ui.JRangeSlider
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class JRangeSlider
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements javax.swing.SwingConstants
A component that lets the user graphically select a contiguous range of values by sliding knobs withing a bounded interval. Like the regular swing JSlider, the component can show both major ticks marks and minor tick marks between them.
Version:
1.0 2007-04-22
See Also:
Serialized Form
